Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the dimension.

description: Use the `AWS::IoT::Dimension` to limit the scope of a metric used in a security profile for AWS IoT Device Defender . For example, using a `TOPIC_FILTER` dimension, you can narrow down the scope of the metric to only MQTT topics where the name matches the pattern specified in the dimension. For API reference, see [CreateDimension](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/iot/latest/apireference/API_CreateDimension.html) and for general information, see [Scoping metrics in security profiles using dimensions](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/iot/latest/developerguide/scoping-security-behavior.html) .

Name.description: A unique identifier for the dimension.

StringValues.description: Specifies the value or list of values for the dimension. For `TOPIC_FILTER` dimensions, this is a pattern used to match the MQTT topic (for example, "admin/#").

Tags.description: Metadata that can be used to manage the dimension.

Type.description: Specifies the type of dimension. Supported types: `TOPIC_FILTER.`
